title: Im salty that there is way more AD champs picked than AP.
body:
It just sucks, please try to make AP champions funner.

I think people generally like AD more because its slightly easier and more reliable in most cases, as well as providing much more micro manipulation/animation canceling, which just creates more immersive gameplay.

I honestly dont blame players for liking AD so much for the reasons Ive mentioned, people like to be challenged, most AP champs are not very challenging.

I really feel this issue needs attention.

replies.body:
The thing is AP champs *are* fun but not OP enough.

EDIT: Then we have Viktor/Azir/etc. Almost forgot about them.

Or take it this way, people like the OP forgot Viktor/Azir/etc exists, they're both "fun" and OP :^)

WHERE ELSE ARE APS PICKED?
top and jungle are for tanks. ADC is for AD.
support is for AP/tank

Rumble and Singed top.
Elise and Fid jungle.

Zyra, Brand, and Annie support.

Maybe not all the best, but all of them can build some amount of AP and be successful.  I guess Mord is more hybrid and I generally dislike the reworked one anyway, so ADC should be an AD.  Even so, there are AP champions for every other position in the game, but AD champs are generally picked more than AP for these (aside from support).
